ComicInfo.Summary: Weeks have passed since the defeat of the Army of Fear in the Enchanted Forest, and the breaking of the Kings' curses at Villeneuve. Nevertheless, things are not as they were before the witches three cast their wicked spells. Is a return to the old kingdoms and the old ways possible, or has the Folk Tale world, and its people, been changed forever? Find out as the next arc of Damsels begins.
